name: bird-species-classification-in-natural-habitat
description:
### Web Application Summary: Indian Bird Species Detection using Deep Learning ## 1. Project Description and Requirements: The web application is designed to detect and classify Indian bird species from user-uploaded images using deep learning. Users can either upload a photo or select one from their gallery. The system needs to identify bird species accurately, validate the presence of birds in the image, and handle multiple bird detections. Key Requirements:
  • Develop a custom dataset with images of various Indian bird species.
  • Train a deep learning model capable of accurate bird species classification.
  • Implement the model in a web application with a user-friendly interface.
  • Deploy the web application on a cloud platform for scalability and accessibility.
